page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: A 1910 HOUSE IN MILL HILL Our house was built in 1910 and it is 75 years old.It is made out of wood, bricks and plaster.It has three floors and three fire places.It also has eight rooms and a porch.Our house is quite big and the eight rooms are the frontroom,T.V. room,a morning room,a kitchen,four bedrooms and a bathroom. Our house has 15 stairs 127 windows it also has 14 doors.It has eighteen lights and there is about one in each room.In some parts of our house the wood is not too well supported.In some rooms the floor is different ,like in the front room it is just floor boards but in the morning room and the kitchen it is tiled.In the hall the ceiling is made of plaster supported by wooden beams.Our roof is made of tiles.Once some fell onto our front drive which is made out of flat stones
